sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>0.0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.ui.ng" name="NG shared components" version="0.0.1" state="published" invalidate_properties="true" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <description>Libraries and Services common to plugins using Angular</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angularui"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.amb"/> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="related_lists" class="com.glide.ui.ng.NGRelatedListProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ngk_attachments" class="com.glide.ui.ngk.attachments.NGKAttachmentsProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="list_history" class="com.glide.ui.ng.streams.NGListHistoryProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ref_list_data" class="com.glide.ui.ng.NGListDataProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="message" class="com.glide.ui.ng.NGMessageProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="user_preference" class="com.glide.ui.ng.NGUserPreferenceProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="progress_status" class="com.glide.ui.ng.NGProgressStatusProcessor" />
<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="avatar_cache_flush" class="com.glide.ui.avatars.UserAvatarCacheBuster" />
<extension point="com.glide.css.presence" name="styles/sn_presence.css" /> <extension point="com.glide.scripts.presence" name="scripts/js_includes_snCommonPresence.js" />
<extension point="com.glide.css.avatar" name="styles/sn_avatar.css" /> <extension point="com.glide.scripts.avatar" name="scripts/js_includes_snCommonAvatar.js" />
<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="StackService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.StackService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="PresenceService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.NGPresenceService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GlobalSearchService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.NGGlobalSearchService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="UserService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.UserService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ClientScriptService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.ClientScriptService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AtMentionService" class="com.glide.ui.form.AtMentionService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="StreamEntryService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.streams.StreamEntryService"/>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AtMentionUtil" class="com.glide.ui.ng.AtMentionUtil" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NGAction" class="com.glide.ui.ng.script.NGAction" /> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Libraries and Services common to plugins using Angular</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.ui.ng</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>NG shared components</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.ui.ng/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui.angular,com.glide.ui.angularui,com.glide.ui.ng.amb</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.ui.ng</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>0.0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
